00034 // MixerTrackSlider is a subclass just to override OnMouseEvent, 
00035 // so we can know when adjustment ends, so we can PushState only then.
00036 class MixerTrackSlider : public ASlider
00037 {
00038 public:
00039    MixerTrackSlider(wxWindow * parent,
00040                      wxWindowID id,
00041                      wxString name,
00042                      const wxPoint & pos, 
00043                      const wxSize & size,
00044                      int style = FRAC_SLIDER,
00045                      bool popup = true,
00046                      bool canUseShift = true,
00047                      float stepValue = STEP_CONTINUOUS, 
00048                      int orientation = wxHORIZONTAL);
00049    virtual ~MixerTrackSlider() {};
00050 
00051    void OnMouseEvent(wxMouseEvent & event);
00052 
00053 protected:
00054    bool mIsPan;
00055 
00056 public:
00057     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00058 };

00079

00145 // wxScrolledWindow ignores mouse clicks in client area, 
00146 // but they don't get passed to Mixerboard.
00147 // We need to catch them to deselect all track clusters.
00148 class MixerBoardScrolledWindow : public wxScrolledWindow 
00149 {
00150 public: 
00151    MixerBoardScrolledWindow(AudacityProject* project, 
00152                               MixerBoard* parent, wxWindowID id = -1, 
00153                               const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition, 
00154                               const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize, 
00155                               long style = wxHSCROLL | wxVSCROLL);
00156    virtual ~MixerBoardScrolledWindow();
00157 
00158 private:
00159    void OnMouseEvent(wxMouseEvent& event);
00160 
00161 private: 
00162    MixerBoard* mMixerBoard;
00163    AudacityProject* mProject;
00164 
00165 public:
00166    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00167 };

00173 class MixerBoard : public wxWindow 
00174 { 
00175    friend class MixerBoardFrame;
00176 
00177 public:
00178    MixerBoard(AudacityProject* pProject, 
00179                wxFrame* parent, 
00180                const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition, 
00181                const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize);
00182    virtual ~MixerBoard();
00183 
00184    // Add clusters for any tracks we're not yet showing.
00185    // Update pointers for tracks we're aleady showing. 
00186    void UpdateTrackClusters(); 
00187 
00188    int GetTrackClustersWidth();
00189    void MoveTrackCluster(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack, bool bUp); // Up in TrackPanel is left in MixerBoard.
00190    void RemoveTrackCluster(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack);
00191 
00192 
00193    wxBitmap* GetMusicalInstrumentBitmap(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack);
00194 
00195    bool HasSolo();
00196 
00197    void RefreshTrackCluster(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack, bool bEraseBackground = true);
00198    void RefreshTrackClusters(bool bEraseBackground = true);
00199    void ResizeTrackClusters();
00200 
00201    void ResetMeters();
00202 
00203    void UpdateName(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack);
00204    void UpdateMute(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack = NULL); // NULL means update for all tracks.
00205    void UpdateSolo(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack = NULL); // NULL means update for all tracks.
00206    void UpdatePan(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack);
00207    void UpdateGain(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack);
00208    
00209    void UpdateMeters(const double t1, const bool bLoopedPlay);
00210 
00211    void UpdateWidth();
00212 
00213 private:
00214    void CreateMuteSoloImages();
00215    int FindMixerTrackCluster(const WaveTrack* pLeftTrack, 
00216                               MixerTrackCluster** hMixerTrackCluster) const;
00217    void LoadMusicalInstruments();
00218 
00219    // event handlers
00220    void OnSize(wxSizeEvent &evt);
00221 
00222 
00223 public:
00224    // mute & solo button images: Create once and store on MixerBoard for use in all MixerTrackClusters.
00225    wxImage* mImageMuteUp;
00226    wxImage* mImageMuteOver;
00227    wxImage* mImageMuteDown;
00228    wxImage* mImageMuteDownWhileSolo; // the one actually alternate image
00229    wxImage* mImageMuteDisabled;
00230    wxImage* mImageSoloUp;
00231    wxImage* mImageSoloOver;
00232    wxImage* mImageSoloDown;
00233    wxImage* mImageSoloDisabled;
00234 
00235    int mMuteSoloWidth;
00236 
00237 private:
00238    // Track clusters are maintained in the same order as the WaveTracks.
00239    MixerTrackClusterArray     mMixerTrackClusters; 
00240 
00241    MusicalInstrumentArray     mMusicalInstruments; 
00242    AudacityProject*           mProject;
00243    MixerBoardScrolledWindow*  mScrolledWindow; // Holds the MixerTrackClusters and handles scrolling.
00244    double                     mPrevT1;
00245    TrackList*                 mTracks;
00246 
00247 public:
00248    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00249 };
